title: The Sky Crawlers
synopsis: In an alternate timeline, the world has seemingly achieved peace. Bereft of international conflicts, wars are now waged between private corporations in place of peaceful nations. Yuuichi Kannami, a recent transfer in Area 262, simply does his job as a contracted fighter pilot. However, the more time he spends at his new base, the more mysteries come to light.
voices: ['Kikuchi, Rinko', 'Kase, Ryo', 'Tanihara, Shosuke', 'Ootsuka, Houchuu', 'Kuriyama, Chiaki', 'Takenaka, Naoto', 'Hishimi, Yuriko', 'Hirakawa, Daisuke']
